mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tables.tbl_user_login (user_key, client_ip, token_value, login_date_time, is_permitted) VALUES (#{userKey}::uuid, #{clientIp}, #{refreshToken}, current_timestamp, true) ON CONFLICT (user_key, client_ip) DO UPDATE SET token_value = #{refreshToken}, login_date_time = current_timestamp, is_permitted = true
mapper.update: UPDATE tables.tbl_user_login SET is_permitted = false WHERE user_key = #{userKey}::uuid AND client_ip = #{clientIp}

UPDATE tables.tbl_user_login SET is_permitted = false WHERE user_key = #{userKey}::uuid AND client_ip NOT IN (SELECT client_ip FROM tables.tbl_user_login WHERE is_permitted = true AND user_key = #{userKey}::uuid ORDER BY login_date_time DESC LIMIT 3)
mapper.select: SELECT token_value FROM tables.tbl_user_login WHERE user_key = #{userKey}::uuid AND client_ip = #{loginIp} AND is_permitted = true
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END AS result FROM tables.tbl_user_login WHERE user_key = #{userKey}::uuid AND client_ip = #{loginIp} AND is_permitted = true
